attributes.action: stop the super halal slaughter house coming to south wales
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: please help stop the super halal slaughter house comong to south wales! it is cruel and barbaric!! we must stop this now to show that britain is no push over!!this is yet another way for muslims to bully the british people!!!come on brits wheres your back bone!!!fight or flight!!fight fire with fire....we cannot let this happen for a number of reasons!!we are giving our country away and it must stop now!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
False or incomplete name or address information
